import React, { useContext } from 'react' import mycontext from '../Context/Createcontext' import daiy from './Daily png.png' function Showuserdata(props) { const {DeleteNote}=useContext(mycontext) const {note,UpdateNote}=props return ( <>
{/* */}

{note.date}

price :{note.price}

work :{note.work}
{daiy}Dailywork : {note.dailywork}
) } export default Showuserdata
